all_questions.question: Why is it a challenge to assess the performance of translation systems?
all_questions.context: So there is a huge chunk of incomparable systems.

all_questions.question: What percentage of the systems are considered statistically indistinguishable from each other?
Why do researchers need to make multiple judgments to determine which systems perform better?
all_questions.context: So you have to do many more judgments to see whether Microsoft was better than humans or not.

all_questions.question: How many systems were considered to be worse than the significantly better one?
all_questions.context: There is only two systems which were like worse.

all_questions.question: Why are there more participating systems in English-to-German than in Czech-to-English?
all_questions.context: Well, there is more speakers and more researchers of German area than for Czech.
